Class IOUtility

java.lang.Object
  IOUtility

public class IOUtility
extends Object

IOUtility is a class to help and pack output and input operation

Author:
Xu Waycell, Way Studios

Method Detail

clearScreen

public void clearScreen()
Clear up all output contents of the terminal. NOTE:It only works in native java terminal.

getBooleanInput

public boolean getBooleanInput(String message)
Obtain a boolean input figure via message interaction. y or Y for true and n or N for false.

Parameters:
message - the normal message
Returns:
the user input value, y or Y return true and n or N return false

getFloatInput

public float getFloatInput(String message,
                           String advancedMessage)
Obtain a float input figure via message interaction

Parameters:
message - the normal message
advancedMessage - the advanced message once user did not input the value in a acceptable way.
Returns:
the user input value
